name: You Won't Believe It's Not Butter!
name_original: You Won't Believe It's Not Butter!
description:
A game created during the 12-hour VGDA Kick-Off Game Jam.

Developers:

Chau Ho: Team Lead/Artist/Sound

Michael Zatlin: Programmer

Kim Marzo: Programmer

Amy Pinedo: Art/ Animatinon

Theme: "Artificial Life"

You are a blob of butter that just made its grand escape! Jump over oily fryers and burning grills, duck under sharp knives, and sprint to the exit to avoid getting eaten in this runner-style game!

Controls:

Left click: Jump

Right click: Crouch
